pages.text: $(li)The Straddle Jump enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)$(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment improves your higher jump height while using the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l).
pages.title: Straddle Jump
